title: Emails received by the mail server are not displayed in Thunderbird
content:
Hello everyone,

I'm experiencing the following issue and am having trouble resolving it.

・Normally, automatic reply emails should be received when there are inquiries from the website, but they are not displayed in Thunderbird. ・When I check the webmail on the mail server, I can see the emails, so they are definitely being delivered to the server. ・Occasionally, there have been delivery failures in the past, but since March 19th, not a single email has been received. ・As shown in the attached image, when I open Thunderbird, it displays "Downloading messages," and even when it reaches 60/60 downloads completed, the 60 emails are not displayed.

I suspect that the spam filter might be reacting, but I'm unsure of what to do. Could you please advise me?
creator: shuta.hanura

title: Import from Android
content: I just did a clean install of mint 22.1. Before I did that I wanted to export my address book. The only option I had was to export to Thunderbird mobile and I downloaded TB mobile to my android Tablet. Now I have a clean install and I need to have my address book back. I have searched high and low on your support pages, Reddit, and others. The only thing that comes close is from your support page that doesn't answer the question as it is circular. how to export to mobile and then import to mobile. How do I import the K9s file my TB mobile exports into my TB desktop? Thank you for your time James Maule

title: Yandex calendar events are not visible in the calendar Thuderbird
content:
I have Yandex Calendar enabled on a Windows computer using CalDAV in two applications - Thunderbird and OneCalendar. On an android phone, Yandex Calendar is enabled in the Yandex Calendar app.

Android App <--> [Yandex] <--> Thunderbird Calendar (Windows) 

                                            <--> OneCalendar (Windows)

When I create an event in the Yandex Calendar app for Android, they are visible in the calendar web interface, they are visible in OneCalendar on a Windows computer, but not visible in the Thunderbird calendar on a Windows computer. All other events created in the apps and web interface are visible in the Thunderbird calendar. All CalDAV connection settings in Thunderbird and OneCalendar are the same

I would be very grateful for any advice to solve this problem.
creator: vitaly.mail

title: Transferring email to another account
content: I have configured two email accounts, both GMail. I often need to transfer email from one account to another within the client. When the message I move contains attachments weighing more than 5MB, Thunderbird crashes and the transfer does not take place. The only solution found, which I would like to avoid, is to download the message with a save as, then drag the .eml file to the right folder on the different account. I also tried setting the parameter mailnews.tcptimeout from 100 (default) to 1000. Nothing has changed. Is there a procedure or program setting that allows seamless transfer of messages from one account to another even when it contains attachments? Thank you
creator: l.amodei

title: Unable to set up Titan mail
content:
I have 2 email addresses on my hostinger account for myself and my wife. A third catch all also exists for the domain ubasti.co.uk.

We have both been using Thunderbird on these accounts successfully for around 2 years now.

Suddenly my wife's account is no longer getting any new emails.

Address is chris@ubasti.co.uk and this is using Windows 11 Home.

I have uninstalled / reinstalled Thunderbird several times now and the result is always the same.

No new emails to download.

I checked and double checked the settings for server incoming and outgoing and they are correct.

I have also tried setting up my wife's email account on my own Thunderbird set up on Windows 10 Pro.

Using the configure manually set up which returns "Thunderbird failed to find the settings for your email account" when clicking Re-test.

Enable third party apps is configured on all 3 accounts.

Can you help with resolving this issue please?
creator: lfcnutter
